item.title: 在特朗普关税动荡之际，英国银行业监管机构停止每日流动性监测
item.description: 英国审慎监管局（Prudential Regulation Authority）首席执行官萨姆-伍兹（Sam Woods）周二在立法者听证会上表示，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策引发了市场混乱，但英国银行业稳定监督机构还没有理由要求银行业报告每日流动性水平。【原文：Britain's banking stability watchdog has not yet seen reason to require the banking sector to report daily liquidity levels despite the market chaos unleashed by U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs, Prudential Regulation Authority CEO Sam Woods told a hearing of lawmakers on Tuesday.】

item.title: 法拉利首席执行官表示，法拉利不会从外部供应商购买战略部件
item.description: 法拉利首席执行官贝内代托-维格纳（Benedetto Vigna）周二表示，这家意大利豪华跑车制造商绝不会从外部供应商那里购买汽车的关键零部件。【原文：Ferrari Chief Executive Benedetto Vigna said on Tuesday the Italian luxury sportscar maker would never buy key components for its vehicles from external suppliers.】

item.title: 如果美国对制药业征收的关税与其他行业一致，阿斯利康将维持 2025 年的预测
item.description: 阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca）首席执行官周二表示，即使美国对欧盟生产的制药产品征收关税，只要关税与其他行业的税率一致，该制药公司仍将维持其2025年的销售指导。【原文：The chief executive of AstraZeneca said on Tuesday that the drugmaker will maintain its 2025 sales guidance even if the U.S. levies tariffs on pharma products made in the European Union, provided they are in line with rates for other sectors.】

item.title: 美国贸易机构将墨西哥列入知识产权优先观察名单
item.description: 美国贸易代表办公室周二将墨西哥列入其知识产权优先观察名单，理由是长期以来对商标假冒执法和药品相关知识产权保护的关切。【原文：The U.S. Trade Representative's office on Tuesday placed Mexico on its priority watch list on intellectual property rights citing longstanding concerns over enforcement against trademark counterfeiting and protection of pharmaceutical-related IP.】

item.title: 中国国家主席习近平称赞人工智能进展，上海之行会见金砖四国银行代表
item.description: 据中国国家通讯社新华社报道，中国国家主席习近平自2023年11月以来首次访问上海，敦促上海加快建设具有全球影响力的科技创新中心。【原文：China's President Xi Jinping urged Shanghai to accelerate efforts to turn itself into a technological and innovation hub with global influence as he made his first visit to the city since November 2023, state news agency Xinhua reported.】

item.title: 消息人士称，印度在对亚马逊和 Flipkart 的电子商务调查中询问苹果和小米
item.description: 熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，作为对亚马逊和沃尔玛旗下 Flipkart 调查的一部分，印度金融犯罪机构已私下要求苹果和小米等智能手机厂商提供销售数据和其他文件。【原文：India's financial crime agency has privately sought sales data and other documents from smartphone players including Apple and Xiaomi as part of an investigation into Amazon and Walmart-owned Flipkart, sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 对冲基金冒险重返市场购买银行股，高盛集团称
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）的一份报告显示，对冲基金在连续八周抛售银行股后，上周重返市场买入银行股。【原文：Hedge funds returned into markets last week to buy bank stocks having sold out of positions for eight straight weeks, a Goldman Sachs note shows.】

item.title: 尽管关税存在不确定性，但 Primark 老板表示仍将致力于美国扩张
item.description: 英国联合食品公司（Associated British Foods）老板周二表示，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对关税的态度反复无常，但该公司旗下的普利马克（Primark）服装零售业务仍致力于在美国扩张。【原文：Associated British Foods' Primark clothing retail business is committed to expanding in the United States despite President Donald Trump's erratic approach to tariffs, its boss said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长西波罗内表示，贸易战可能会降低欧元区的经济增长和通货膨胀率
item.description: 欧洲央行董事会成员皮耶罗-西波隆（Piero Cipollone）周二表示，全球贸易战可能会降低欧元区的经济增长和通胀率，并可能对相关国家产生 "明确的衰退效应"。【原文：A global trade war could lower both economic growth and inflation in the euro zone and it could have an "unambiguously recessionary effect" on the countries involved, ECB board member Piero Cipollone said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国大使馆称比亚迪柬埔寨汽车厂破土动工
item.description: 据中国驻柬埔寨大使馆称，中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪在柬埔寨的乘用车工厂于本周一破土动工。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle giant BYD broke ground on its Cambodia passenger vehicle factory on Monday, according to the Chinese embassy in Cambodia.】

item.title: 迫于埃利奥特的压力，英国石油公司战略主管奇尔基亚将于 6 月离职
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP）周二表示，该公司战略与可持续发展主管朱莉娅-切尔奇亚（Giulia Chierchia）将于 6 月 1 日卸任，她是该公司进军可再生能源这一命运多舛的项目的主要设计师。【原文：BP's strategy and sustainability chief Giulia Chierchia, the key architect of the group's ill-fated foray into renewables, will step down on June 1, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国广州港开通秘鲁航线
item.description: 据中国中央电视台报道，中国南方最大的航运枢纽广州港周二开通了直达秘鲁尚凯港的航线，此举将降低物流成本，促进与拉美地区的贸易往来。【原文：China's Guangzhou Port, the largest shipping hub in the country's south, opened a direct route to Chancay port in Peru on Tuesday, state broadcaster CCTV reported, a move it said would reduce logistics costs and bolster trade with Latin America.】

item.title: 中国四月工厂活动因特朗普关税影响而下滑：路透社民调
item.description: 路透社周二的一项民意调查显示，由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的 "解放日 "一揽子关税措施使两个月的复苏戛然而止，中国的工厂活动在四月份可能出现萎缩。【原文：China's factory activity likely contracted in April, a Reuters poll showed on Tuesday, as Donald Trump's "Liberation Day" package of tariffs brought a sudden halt to two months of recovery.】

item.title: 英国收购委员会给予高通更多时间竞购 Alphawave
item.description: 英国半导体公司Alphawave IP Group周二表示，英国收购委员会已将美国芯片制造商高通公司的收购要约截止日期延长至5月12日。【原文：British semiconductor company Alphawave IP Group on Tuesday said the UK takeover panel has extended the deadline for a takeover offer by U.S. chipmaker Qualcomm to May 12.】

item.title: 印尼部长称 LG 将再投资 17 亿美元建电池厂
item.description: 印尼投资部长周二表示，韩国LG集团将继续致力于印尼的发展，并将对一家电池厂增加17亿美元的投资，使该项目的投资总额增至28亿美元。【原文：South Korea's LG group remains committed to Indonesia and will increase its investment in a battery cell factory by $1.7 billion, raising total investment in the project to $2.8 billion, Indonesia's investment minister said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 保时捷第一季度利润率因中国市场疲软和美国关税而大幅下滑
item.description: 豪华跑车制造商保时捷公司周二表示，受中国需求疲软和美国征收进口关税的影响，该公司第一季度营业利润率降至8.6%，低于分析师预期。【原文：Luxury sportscar maker Porsche AG on Tuesday said its operating margin fell to 8.6% in the first quarter, below analyst estimates, hit by weaker demand in China as well as U.S. import tariffs.】

item.title: 澳大利亚对华葡萄酒出口激增势头开始放缓
item.description: 随着两国关系的改善，澳大利亚对中国的葡萄酒出口热潮正呈现出放缓的迹象，而全球销往世界第二大经济体的葡萄酒数量也在普遍下降。【原文：Australia's wine export boom to China that followed an improvement in relations between the two countries is showing signs of slowing, amid a broader global decline in the number of bottles headed to the world's second-largest economy.】

item.title: 生物燃料制造商耐斯特预计关税影响有限
item.description: 芬兰生物燃料生产商和炼油商奈斯特公司（Neste）周二表示，预计美国关税对其业务的影响有限，但该公司警告说，可再生燃料将持续供过于求，市场将出现波动。【原文：Finnish biofuel maker and oil refiner Neste expects U.S. tariffs will only have a limited impact on its business, it said on Tuesday, but warned of continuous oversupply in renewable fuel and market volatility.】

item.title: 英国石油公司公布利润为 14 亿美元，低于预期
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP）周二公布的第一季度基本替代成本利润为 13.8 亿美元，低于分析师在公司提供的民意调查中预计的 15.3 亿美元，不及预期。【原文：BP missed forecasts on Tuesday with an underlying replacement cost profit of $1.38 billion for the first quarter, below the $1.53 billion expected by analysts in a company-provided poll.】

item.title: 嘉士伯维持全年展望，警告消费者情绪不稳定
item.description: 丹麦啤酒酿造商嘉士伯周二公布的第一季度销售额略低于预期，尽管该公司警告称消费者情绪不稳定，但仍维持全年展望不变。【原文：Danish brewer Carlsberg on Tuesday reported first-quarter sales slightly below expectations and kept its outlook for the full year unchanged despite warning of volatile consumer sentiment.】

item.title: 阿迪达斯警告美国关税将增加成本，并确认了前景展望
item.description: 德国运动服制造商阿迪达斯周二确认了其2025年的业绩指导，但表示预计对美国进口产品征收更高的关税最终将导致其所有产品的市场成本上升。【原文：German sportswear maker Adidas confirmed its guidance for 2025 on Tuesday, but said it expected higher tariffs on imports into the U.S. to eventually cause higher costs for all its products for the market.】

item.title: 汇丰银行减持中资银行股份，损失高达 16 亿美元
item.description: 汇丰银行周二表示，其在交通银行（BOCOM）的持股比例将从19.03%降至约16%，并将因该中资银行的私募股权筹资而导致高达16亿美元的亏损。【原文：HSBC said on Tuesday that its stake in Bank of Communications (BOCOM) will drop to about 16% from 19.03%, and it will book a loss of up to $1.6 billion as a result of the Chinese bank's fundraising by private placement of shares.】

item.title: 中国驻印度大使：北京不会参与市场倾销
item.description: 中国驻印度大使许飞宏周二撰文称，中国不会因为与美国的贸易战和关税战而在其他国家倾销商品，他试图消除人们对中国廉价商品充斥其他市场的担忧。【原文：China will not dump its goods in other countries due to its trade and tariff war with the U.S., Beijing's ambassador to India, Xu Feihong, wrote in an article on Tuesday, trying to allay fears of cheap Chinese goods flooding other markets.】

item.title: 美国会计师事务所利用印度缓解人才紧缺问题
item.description: 包括 RSM US、Moss Adams、贝恩资本支持的 Sikich 和 Apax Partners 支持的 CohnReznick 在内的美国会计师事务所正在印度扩大业务，以解决国内会计师严重短缺的问题。【原文：U.S. accounting firms including RSM US, Moss Adams, Bain Capital-backed Sikich and Apax Partners-backed CohnReznick are expanding their operations in India to tackle an acute shortage of accountants at home.】

item.title: 德意志银行第一季度利润增长 39%，但受关税影响
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）周二公布第一季度利润增长 39%，原因是其全球投资银行部门在动荡的市场中债券和货币交易收入大幅增长。【原文：Deutsche Bank on Tuesday posted a 39% rise in first-quarter profit after its global investment banking division generated a big increase in revenue in bond and currency trading during volatile markets.】

item.title: 受益于 ETF 增长和英国客户，Amundi 管理资产增长 6
item.description: 欧洲最大的基金管理公司 Amundi 周二公布的季度资金流入情况符合预期，因为在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）当选总统后投资从美国转向欧洲之际，越来越多的人继续将资金投入追踪市场的基金。【原文：Amundi , Europe's biggest fund manager, posted quarterly inflows in line with expectations on Tuesday, as more people continued to put money into funds that track the market during a time when investment shifted from the United States to Europe following Donald Trump's election as president.】

item.title: 汉莎航空确认 2025 年前景，为可能的贸易后果做好准备
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Lufthansa）周二确认了其 2025 年的经营业绩预测，但警告说，该公司正在密切关注与美国的贸易紧张局势可能造成的影响。【原文：German airline Lufthansa on Tuesday confirmed its operating result forecast for 2025, but warned that it was closely monitoring the possible impact of trade tensions with the United States.】

item.title: 印度市场迎来近两年来最长时间的外国购买热潮
item.description: 周一，外国投资者延续了自2023年7月以来最长的买盘热潮，美国贸易协议的希望、低廉的企业估值以及印度对全球紧张局势的相对抵御能力等因素都起到了推波助澜的作用，帮助市场摆脱了对印巴摩擦的担忧。【原文：Foreign investors extended their longest buying spree since July 2023 on Monday, fuelled by U.S. trade deal hopes, cheap corporate valuations, and India's relative resilience to global tensions, helping markets shrug off concerns over India-Pakistan frictions.】

item.title: 早间竞标特朗普 2.0 仅剩 1362 天
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 汇丰银行第一季度利润下降 25%；启动 30 亿美元回购计划
item.description: 汇丰银行周二公布，由于加拿大和阿根廷业务处置的一次性费用，第一季度利润下降了 25%，随后启动了 30 亿美元的股票回购计划。【原文：HSBC launched a $3 billion share buyback after reporting a 25% fall in first-quarter profit on Tuesday due to one time charges related to business disposals in Canada and Argentina.】
